entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 3:54 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: WNW 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow late in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
